title: eBay online shopping & selling - Apps on Google Play
text: With the eBay mobile app, buy and sell millions of items on the go. Discover exclusive deals every day in our online marketplace. Never miss a deal Online shopping and selling in the eBay app is simple. Get real-time alerts about Daily Deals, auctions, order updates, and so much more—all sent to your device with personalized push notifications. Give pre-loved items a new home. Whether you’re looking to sell clothing, tech, or car parts, our app is always at your fingertips. Quickly list items with AI Snap or upload a photo in the eBay app and let AI instantly generate descriptions and key details for your listing—including brand, category, and more. Search, find, and save faves ● Discover on-trend items: Buy fashion, handbags, jewelry, watches, and more. ● Shop by condition: Filter for new, pre-loved, used, or eBay Refurbished items. ● Shop by category: Browse fashion, jewelry, sneakers, tech, auto parts, and more. ● Sell and cash in: List used car parts, tech, clothing, and more. Create your own store to pass on your treasures. ● Heart your faves: Never miss the latest drops and deals when you save your most-loved finds. ● Search with pics: See something you like? Upload a photo and find matches instantly to buy it now. ● Top items for less: From car accessories to clothing, find high quality at the right price.
